metadata.title: CVE-2016-4861 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The (1) order and (2) group methods in Zend_Db_Select in the Zend Frameworkbefore 1.12.20 might allow remote attackers to conduct SQL injectionattacks by leveraging failure to remove comments from an SQL statementbefore validation.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
